phrases.phraseTitle: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Whatever you are, be a good one.
We shape our tools and thereafter our tools shape us.
Make it work, make it right, make it fast.

Service to others is the rent you pay
for your room here on Earth.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

Quality means doing it right
when no one is looking.

Integrity is doing the right thing,
even when no one is watching.

Finding a purpose is not about choosing the right career;
it's about learning how to serve more effectively.
